Can I use the `getcurrencyconverters` API to retrieve currencies that have a VRSC reserve ratio of less than 10%?

No, the `getcurrencyconverters` API actually retrieves all currencies that have a VRSC reserve ratio of greater than 10%, not less than 10%. It's designed to filter out currencies that don't meet this minimum reserve ratio threshold.

ueries
The `getcurrencyconverters` API retrieves all currencies that have at least 1000 VRSC in reserve, are greater than 10% VRSC reserve ratio, and have all listed currencies as reserves
- **E.g. BTC ETH:**
  ```
  verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrencyconverters btc eth
  ```
  Will return all currencies that have btc/eth markets at or above the liquidity threshold.
